item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 22, 2024 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A data table thousands of years old (2020) (93 points | 26 comments)
2. Dividing unsigned 8-bit numbers (93 points | 51 comments)
3. City Roads: A tool to draw all roads in a city at once (116 points | 19 comments)
4. Query Apple's FindMy network with Python (321 points | 140 comments)
5. Ideas from "A Philosophy of Software Design" (76 points | 39 comments)
6. Keeping a Changelog at Work (12 points | 2 comments)
7. Enum of Arrays (62 points | 15 comments)
8. A curious case of O(N^2) behavior which should be O(N) (2023) (39 points | 4 comments)
9. Richard Bellman on the Birth of Dynamic Programming (2002) [pdf] (17 points | 1 comment)
10. Language and Personality (12 points | 6 comments)
11. JEP 483: Ahead-of-Time Class Loading and Linking (39 points | 4 comments)
12. Show HN: Rivet Actors – Durable Objects build with Rust, FoundationDB, Isolates (75 points | 17 comments)
13. Show HN: Eonfall – A new third-person co-op action game built for the web (133 points | 77 comments)
14. US judge finds NSO Group liable for hacking journalists via WhatsApp (474 points | 143 comments)
15. Grammarly acquires Coda (92 points | 55 comments)
16. Spherical Harmonics (21 points | 17 comments)
17. Train a Mnist VAE with C and CUDA (11 points | discuss)
18. Wuppertal's suspended monorail proved its doubters wrong [video] (42 points | 16 comments)
19. Show HN: Demo of my web game about social persuasion (48 points | 22 comments)
20. Translating 10M lines of Java to Kotlin (77 points | 65 comments)
21. Show HN: GitHub-assistant – Natural language questions from your GitHub data (3 points | 3 comments)
22. Rosetta 2 creator leaves Apple to work on Lean full-time (12 points | 4 comments)
23. Talking over a wall changed my direction as a programmer (58 points | 31 comments)
24. How we made our AI code review bot stop leaving nitpicky comments (78 points | 53 comments)
25. Generate Color Palettes from Text (16 points | 4 comments)
26. More than 140 Kenya Facebook moderators sue after diagnoses of PTSD (180 points | 132 comments)
27. Cqd: Colour my __dir__ please (13 points | 2 comments)
28. Turing Machines (59 points | 20 comments)
29. Introducing S2 (237 points | 126 comments)
30. Show HN: Get e-signatures & pay per signed doc (19 points | 31 comments)
